PropertyList.title: McDonnell Douglas MD-80 Help
PropertyList.text:
Available documentation can be viewed in the "Documentation" menu.
2D versions of certain cockpit panels are included to make certain tasks easier. These can be opened from the "2D Panels" menu.
Aircraft Config Center: Can be used to load panel states and set ground equipment, as well as configure simulation and aircraft options.
Simulation: * IRS Aligns Instantly: Skips the ~10 minute alignment process of the IRS (if equipped). * Keyboard Mode: Maps flight controls to number pad and number rows instead of view shortcuts. * Open When FlightGear Starts: Opens the Aircraft Config Center automatically when FlightGear starts. * Separate Tiller Axis: Separates the tiller from the rudder and maps it to /controls/gear/steering.
Aircraft: * Armed Altitude as Flight Levels: Equips the aircraft with the optional feature to show flight level on the FMA. * Auto Arm Altitude: Equips the aircraft with the optional feature to automatically arm altitude. * Combined Standby: Equips the aircraft with the combined standby instead of split instruments. * IRS Equipped: Equips the aircraft with the IRS instead of AHRS (EFIS panel only).
Panel Configuration: * Instrumentation: Selects between Analog and EFIS instrument layouts. * Flight Director: EFIS panel only, selects between single cue (inverted V-bar) or dual cue (cross bars) flight directors.
